website_summaries.verdict: With its deep black color scheme, the Machine is definitely a man's watch. We like the chronograph functions, and engraved bezel. Good work watch, with the option of going formal.
pros: Oversize dial, but watch is lightweight
Durable enough for outdoor or work use
cons: Not as water-resistant as other models
No contrast means chronograph displays can be difficult to read

customer_reviews.title: Good .. not great.
customer_reviews.text: Elegant and stylish .. although the color tone isn't as pictured (see pictures) And there's a "plastic-y" feel to it which doesn't correlate to the price and the brand name.
customer_reviews.author: Sherif

customer_reviews.title: Good watch
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift from my husband. It's my 2nd Fossil watch. I have been diagnosed with contact allergy/sensitivity to certain metals, and my dermatologist went on about my need to be caution about even stainless steel watches because some aren't truly that. I am happy to report, I have had no issues with these watches. I was able to use my at home link adjuster kit to make the wristband shorter. Easy to read. If you are big on your watch not looking too cheap- I would recommend the silver Fossil watches over this one. It looks much cheaper than my silver one of same price. For me it's not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Strap is worn out
customer_reviews.text: I received my watch today. I'm shocked to receive a damaged piece. Strap is worn out in between the links.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I like my new Fossil. Is very comfortable. Thanks very much
customer_reviews.author: luis

customer_reviews.title: ... husband for our anniversary and I think it looks great! The second hand doesn’t line up with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband for our anniversary and I think it looks great! The second hand doesn’t line up with the little tick marks and it bothers him, but I’m not sure if that’s just a flaw with his, or with all of them. The packaging is not great. When I opened it, the lid of the tin box was off, and the watch could have very easily been damaged while shipping. Luckily, it wasn’t. I think it is a great watch for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: One of a kind!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is simply beautiful!! Had a different fossil in mind, when I went to purchase it. It was sold out.. So I saw this one (I'm so glad I did) Love the color scheme. it's a stainless steel strap with silicon going down the middle. Not too heavy and not too big, but big enough to be noticed!! Love love love this watch!! The compliments keep coming!!
customer_reviews.author: Luikablooie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic price, fits great, looks great
customer_reviews.text: I have large arms for working out for years. I wanted a large case watch for weekend wearing that wasn't too nice I would be worried about scratches. Basically an all day wear for weekend things. The price here can't be beat, it feels and looks great. The silicone band makes me not worry about damaging my car when I wash it. Great everyday watch or nice work watch upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Saiger

customer_reviews.title: Sharp watch, not the deal they used to be
customer_reviews.text: I've had about a half dozen Fossil watches over the years and they've all been absolute tanks and had neat little quirks (rotating dial, etc.). This was pretty standard issue - I didn't really feel like it was worth the price. I ended up returning it, because the box had a small dent, but the face was spiderwebbed. Really made me question the durability if it broke that easily.
customer_reviews.author: jindoakuji

customer_reviews.title: Classy men's Fossil Watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an anniversary gift for my husband. He wanted a watch that could be dressy yet sporty. He loved the smoke color of the watch as well as the blue accented face. The bezel is very classy and the watch was not huge, but just right in size. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: kcee74

customer_reviews.title: Timepiece of the future
customer_reviews.text: This is the first watch I've owned in a long time. I have to say it came exactly how it's described and I fell in love with it the moment I put it on. Very pleased with this watch
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Ay man lemme just say that this is beautiful watch. I could see the testosterone flowing through ...
customer_reviews.text: Ay man lemme just say that this is beautiful watch. I could see the testosterone flowing through the box as soon as I opened it. Good job fossil. By men... for men.
customer_reviews.author: Choudhry

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery, watch has pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: Delivered very quickly. Watch seems conformable, but the band needs to be broken in. A bit hard to read in medium to low light. It does have a dark face, so that's expected I guess. The subdials on the watch itself aren't quite straight, always slightly to the left or to the right of center when you zero them out. Maybe it bugs me more than it should. No instructions for the watch in box, can be found at fossil.com. The bracelet is... there. Didn't really buy it for that. Maybe I'll start being "that guy".
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday watch.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch as a birthday gift for my BF. The price was such as good deal so I bought it. I saw the same watch at Macy's and it was ~$175. My BF loved that it felt light weight and the silicone band was flexible for everyday use and he liked the size of the face. If you like your watch having a bigger face then this watch is for you. Great gift for birthdays or for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the man in your life
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is a very "rugged" man, and he loves this because of how durable it is. He has been wearing it at work and at home (even in the shower) and it's still doing fine (only had about 10 days so time will tell...no pun intended). I love it because I think it looks sleek and classy as well. It was a valentine's gift-and I feel I definitely made the right choice!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Gravatt

customer_reviews.title: Decent Watch
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good watch. A bit hefty, but I like that. No illumination, but knew that going in. The only critical issue I've encountered after several years of occasional wear is the spring loaded slip tangs on the band pins. They protrude very slightly to facilitate removal and reinstallation of the band. And they function very well for that purpose, however, they protrude just enough that after several hours of wear, I've noticed a minor itch or irritation. The irritation is relieved immediately when removing the watch. Other than that minor issue, I've enjoyed the watch very much.
customer_reviews.author: DMark

customer_reviews.title: Fossil Men’s Watch
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch!! It’s very nice . I bought it for my fiancé for his upcoming Bornday.. Only thing I didn’t like was it was already working, ticking when it arrived (plastic tip you pull out was gone) so the battery will be probably gone by the time he wears it.. I just bought myself one also I reviewed the same thing with that watch also.. Other than that I think it’s very nice..
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Lovely watch and gorgeous holiday packaging
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this watch gorgeous, it has a nice weight to it. It comes with a warranty card as well. I was pleasantly surprised at the packaging. It came in a holiday tin. I didn't even have to wrap it. I put a small bow and a name tag on it and put it under the tree!
customer_reviews.author: imzinchworm

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and masculine, and his work friends comment on it
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wearing this for about 6 weeks and is very happy with it. His wrist is smaller than average and we had to have 3 links removed and it still slides a little but the jeweler - who was wearing almost this exact watch - recommended not removing any more links. Other than the large fit (not Fossil's problem) he's very, very happy with the watch.
customer_reviews.author: wandermami

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch, we'll see how it holds up. But everything works I. It, it's clean ect. Had to get the links adjusted but that'll be different for everyone. Reason I gave it 4 not 5 stars is that the chain links make an annoying higher pitched rubbing noise. Like a needle on glass. But I'm sure will go away once the watch has been worn for a longer period of time. Also the watch hands glow after you charge them with a bit of light, only down side is they don't glow that long, doubt it'll last 8hrs + Otherwise, money well spent :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving it on him
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my boy friend's birthday and he loves it! It looks great on his arm as well....
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch from Fossil
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item as a gift. The person who received it from me said it was an extremely good looking watch. The wristband is a definite plus. I saw the watch too and my initial reaction was "what a great looking watch!"
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Bob

customer_reviews.title: FOSSIL watches are Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch. Colors stand out. Biggest attraction about this watch is the Super Thick Brown Leather Band. Really gives it a cool, casual feel. The face does not light up, and the hands on the very tip light up only slightly, so I wouldn't take this thing in the woods to tell time. Watch did come with a few minor nicks, but not enough to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Star Wars Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I received it today and the bracelet is not clasped. I watched the video and tried to clasp for an hour, no luck. Returning this defective cheap looking watch. It’s supposed to be an anniversary gift for my husband in the next 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: bright girl

customer_reviews.title: Look nice, feel ok, not favorites
customer_reviews.text: While they look great and I wear them a lot, the thing that holds the strap on the back of the belt is too bulky and gets caught on things often or just slides down and leaves the end of the belt loose which in turn gets caught on things. I like them and I like them enough to wear them often. The leather is already showing the signs of wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Kyryll

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, a little hard to size
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, the links are a bit large so if one needs to be removed it can make the fit quite a bit different. My son wears it and loves it but did have to switch arms because on the one arm it was either too loose or too tight, the other arm seemed to be just right. He can do that but I never would be able to do that, I would had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: J. N.

customer_reviews.title: OK for what it costs
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look of this watch and thought “only $88?”. I figured, why not try it out? The buttons on the side feel more like rubber which I did not expect from something other than a g-shock type watch and the bracelet feels really “tinny”. I feel like for the price it should deserve more of a 4 star rating but I expected more from Fossil. Definitely won’t be buying a watch like this online again without being able to wear it and try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Clark

customer_reviews.title: I like watches, my only choice in men's jewelry and ...
customer_reviews.text: I like watches, my only choice in men's jewelry and I'm very fond of this watch! I had watched the price on Amazon and hesitated buying it hoping it would go lower but they raised it to full retail so I did not buy. Kept checking and one day found they had finally reduced the price so I quickly purchased it. I really wanted an all black watch and honestly I had been looking at this Fossil for about six months. Nicely constructed chronograph with silicone band and clear crystal. Looks good and I'm glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Tulsa

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. It's ok for tiny wrists like mine.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great watch for 60 $. That's what I paid. It's heavy enough. I like the way it feels on my wrist I thought it was going to be too big for me but I think it's ok. I have a very small wrist. I recommend because of the price and the way it looks. Great option under 70$
customer_reviews.author: elteacher

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Good looking watch!! Husband gets compliments on it all the time. It looked good in the picture, but it’s even nicer in person!
customer_reviews.author: BJ Myers

customer_reviews.title: I like the change of a silicone band
customer_reviews.text: I like the change of a silicone band. It is really smooth and gives me a similar feel to a watch I use for working out. It's easy to put on and doesn't seem too weighty, as some watches can be. This is my second Fossil watch. My first one is great, except that the band has broken twice, but Fossil has replaced the second time it broke. They are great watches for the price. You pay a bit more but they look really classy.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Michels

customer_reviews.title: It's a watch but it is impossible to tell the time.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is impressive if you don't need it for its purpose: to tell the time. The watch hands hide behind circles so that whenever the time lies behind a circle you have to guess. Moreover, the hands are only partially white while most of them are as black as the watch background.
customer_reviews.author: israela hirsch

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This was too small for my athletic husbands wrist. Also very cheap feel and not worth the money I paid even with the deal
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband I can’t wait to give it for Christmas! Super classy watch but durable for work! I hope it lasts him for years to come. He loves black and the hint of blue is great
customer_reviews.author: A Nors

customer_reviews.title: Nice Casual Watch
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 Fossil watches and I like all of them. This one is a nice casual watch. It has sturdy leather wrist band and is comfortable to wear. The 3 dials inside are strictly decoration. Fossil doesn't even include instructions on what they do or how to set them etc. If you are looking for a nice casual watch that looks good and keeps time this is a nice watch If you want alarms, bells and whistles then this is not the watch for you.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton L Lovell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great wrist watch. Wasn't expecting it to be set to the correct time in my area but it was. The quality is great and I've gotten many compliments. The band is also a great bonus
customer_reviews.author: Joe F.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Watch
customer_reviews.text: I loved this watch. I bought it to give it as a gift for my boyfriend and it's pretty amazing the design of the watch and the bracelet. Real leather. I recommend this watch to every Fossil lover. The only thing I would like to say to the seller is to always be careful about the package of the watch. I say this because the watch's box has a scratch in one of the edge, I mean nothing serious but still be careful. Thanks a lot!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thiswatch is a very sleek unit
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a very sleek unit, not too flashy but very nice. I definitely like the design! Thanks Fossil and Amazon of course, for a wonderful product and a reasonable price. I recommend this for those who don't want an excessively flashy watch with great quality look.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Lee

customer_reviews.title: I love fossil!
customer_reviews.text: The watch is perfect and so beautiful. Was more small then I expect but it's ok. I will buy more in the future for sure fossil is my favorite brand
customer_reviews.author: Dannypotter69

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this watch. I work swing shifts right now and was a little worried about being able to see the time with a dark background, but it is great. I love the subtle blue silicone accent to go along with my role in and support of law enforcement.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ailinger

customer_reviews.title: Nice dark gray finish and the blue accents on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid watch from fossil as always. Nice dark gray finish and the blue accents on the face really stand out. Watch can be used for casual or dress so a great everyday timepiece.
customer_reviews.author: dday2364

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: I know I read one review that said this watch was not waterproof. Well mine is. I've worn this thing in the shower, swimming, doing dishes (yes, I am a man who does dishes), and not a hint of moisture inside the glass. It looks as good as it does in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: TC101

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a looker. It doesn't glow nor have back light.
customer_reviews.text: Is much beautiful in person, definitely a looker. Will update the review with photos and additional details. One thing is sure: this watch is heavy and I strongly recommend wearing it a bit on the tight side to avoid feeling the case moving around.
customer_reviews.author: Guille Rodríguez

customer_reviews.title: Fossil is a great brand
customer_reviews.text: My wife gave me this as a gift. I was looking for certain features and this watch had them all. I have been very happy with it. Be aware it is water resistant. Very few promise waterproof. It works for me as I don't take it diving though I do wear water skiing.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy reliable watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who works in the oil field. This watch has held up well, is made of rubber like material so it is very easy to clean and has been a great work watch for over a year now. He loves it and we would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: bigred

customer_reviews.title: Packaging sucked!!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, first saw this watch back in August for about 80 bucks but every time I went back to look at it, the price kept going up, guess demand was high for it, the watch came very quick only issue I had was the packaging, it was in its metal tin that it came in but their was nothing in the cardboard box to protect it, so the top of the tin box and come off, thank god the watch face didn’t get broken, overall very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Hinman

customer_reviews.title: front glass shattered for a light tap
customer_reviews.text: I've bought many fossil watches but this one, the glass shattered on the lightest tap. very disappointed. Not a good quality glass on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Abdugafurov

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It's sturdy, water resistant, glows in the dark, and looks great on my wrist. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Radu Gruian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch
customer_reviews.text: An awesome watch. It is of outstanding quality and a really solid build. It won't lose time and it is not affected by water since it's 5ATM. The wrist band is easy to remove and will not fall of on it's own, at any moment at all. Only con is that the worst band will get scratches it it's rubbed on a plastic counter.
customer_reviews.author: Agustín Fontana

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this watch. It is heavy and masculine and durable. I would buy it again. If was also easy to take links out for my size.
customer_reviews.author: Product Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I got my son this for Christmas and it looks amazing. Couldn't be happier. Was way cheaper than ordering from the Fossil site. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive men's watch. Well worth the money. The only complaint I have is that it did not come with an owners manual, which was kind of odd. Other than that I highly recommend this watch for an every day watch under $100.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit larger then what I would normally wear, but it has a great look and I have gotten used to the size. The weight isn't bad, it's what I would expect for it's size. Nice smooth finish on the black band.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great and unique looking watch without being flashy
customer_reviews.text: Great and unique looking watch without being flashy. Fits my larger wrist well, even has some slack to it. Some of the finish is rubbing off on the outer band- I assume due to my wrist resting on a desk as I type. Bought on sale, would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Fronk

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch very classic my wife love it 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything You Could Want
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this watch for about a week now and I am delighted to say it is everything I could have hoped for. The timer function is excellent and the stainless steel wrist band is comfortable. The color makes it wearable with many different outfits and also has a (pardon my pun) "timeless" feel.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great package
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, been wearing this for the past two weeks over my Bambino v1, Seiko 5 and more. Got a ton of compliments for it and the bracelet as well, definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nave

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! Subtle Glow in the dark hands and hour marks. Nice blue accents, nice grey colour to it. Like many watches it does come bigger with adjustable/removable links(need to take it to a jeweler or You could easily do it yourself if you have a kit) Being a fossil watch it has removable straps so you could essentially buy any strap if you wanted to. I get compliments on it almost everytime im out :)
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The item did not come in a box, it was described in the product details that it did. I bought this for my boyfriends birthday and I would not give it to him in the condition it is in. Now I have to rush to get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, I had to take 3 links out of it because that's what you have to do when you're a woman buying a mens watch but it was super easy. So far, it's much better quality than I'm use too and I hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time weighs heavy on my hand
customer_reviews.text: Extremely hard for me to read this watch. Also, the band is too stiff and thick, making the watch feel cumbersome on my wrist. No looking though! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Curt Lauber

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this watch for my son after googling best watches to buy. This watch is very nice and looks great. My 18 year old son loved it and wears it often.
customer_reviews.author: cats

customer_reviews.title: I like the way it looks otherwise
customer_reviews.text: It's very heavy and when I received the shipping box, the Fossil tin can was open and the watch was rolling around the bottom of the box. It's a gift so I hope it still works. I like the way it looks otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Franny

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I really love the customer service of this company ( not fossil ) they are so nice and helpful. You can even reach them via text and they respond so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: SUNA

customer_reviews.title: My Fossil watch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch because it was attractive and classy looking. It goes well with both casual and dress attire perfectly; sturdy built quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K DeMille

customer_reviews.title: Eats battery very quickly, clasp keeps popping off but looks nice..... if it could only stay on my wrist and keep time...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in Sept. 2017, it is December 2017 right now - it already stopped keeping time and running very late. 3 months? really? for a fossil? Garbage. Also the one side clasp lock is useless, keeps popping off, but I guess it was worth it to save $2 on manufacturing. Good going fossil, competing to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: es

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch! I've always been a fan of Fossil brand. But this watch and the bracelet is toned down and elegant at same time. Just what I needed and wanted to round out my accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Fossil watch in a decade and each one has been so worth my money. The silicon bracelet makes this one lighter compared to my previous ones with metal straps. My biggest satisfaction with this watch is it's fashionable look. I've been in a couple of scratch situations in the past week and each time I've looked at my screen and smiled looking at the spotless clear glass. I've been wearing this watch for two months now, and although I like to regularly have a new time machine on my wrist, this feels and looks like I'd be wearing it for a minimum of three years.
customer_reviews.author: PapJeff

customer_reviews.title: Product was shipped in a nice box and the watch was working when I opened ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was shipped in a nice box and the watch was working when I opened it. The watch is well built and looks great
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forever to find a sub $100 watch with positive reviews and this is it! Very stylish and built well. Has good weight to it and looks professional yet stylish at the same time. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch for my son. He is a collector. Has a watch for every day. Will love the leather bracelet as well.
customer_reviews.author: RockinDad

customer_reviews.title: how this is much better than i thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: SOOOOLLLLLLLIIIIIIDDDDD....! how this is much better than i thought it would be... got some weight to it and has a great build, looks handsome and i would buy it again... perfect gift...!
customer_reviews.author: Bari Bari

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch. The band was a little big
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. The band was a little big, but that's something that I fixed with a paper clip and a pair of needle nose pliers. I just wish that the hands were somewhat able to be read in the dark. That is my only issue, but it is not really a flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Big dial; color doesn't match as advertized
customer_reviews.text: Make sure the dial size is okay for you. It was too big for my arms, but fortunately it was to be gifted to a friend, and he liked it. The dial is kind of too big, in my opinion. Further, the watch didn't have the blue needles or background as shown in the product images when it arrived. It had grey needles.
customer_reviews.author: Omanshu

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: The added wrist band kinda sucks but the watch itself looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Johnson and the Detectives

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - Braclet is not original
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this particular one watch from here. Because this was the one returned by many buyers after reviewed the watch bracelet is not original including myself. The watch dial looks stunning but the watch bracelet has repainted and the enamels are easily visible. Doesn't looks like a brand one and it looks like duplicate one. Buy it from Fossil showroom.
customer_reviews.author: MSathiya

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and durable.
customer_reviews.text: To say I love this watch is an understatement. It wasn't my first choice since I prefer watches with tachometers. However this watch looks great and feels great. Also it is very water proof. I have gone swimming with it multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Asa Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Elegant watch
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. Elegant watch i like the satin black ⚫ color.
customer_reviews.author: Pete!

customer_reviews.title: More or less
customer_reviews.text: Although it is very nice watch, the materials are of poor quality. If you want a good watch, do not buy designer watches.
customer_reviews.author: Pernalete Valles

customer_reviews.title: Love my watch it looks great and keeps good time
customer_reviews.text: Love my watch it looks great and keeps good time. However when flying some how it affects the watch and is not accurate. When I landed reset and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: KEITH ROUSE

customer_reviews.title: Fossil for the win!
customer_reviews.text: You can not go wrong with fossil watches! Great quality. Easy to remove links and reassemble. Great quality product at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband is in love with this watch. Came quickly and was in mint condition. Handsome watch that fits the wrist nicely, he loves the leather bracket it comes with. The box has a ding on the side when I got it, but nothing wrong with the watch itself
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Marine

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Graduation present for my son. He loves it it’s a nice watch.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W

customer_reviews.title: Good watch
customer_reviews.text: I really like how sleek this watch is with the functions it provides. It's a little on the heavy side but still a great watch.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Terrible packing. It comes loose in a brown envelope. Not secured at all.
customer_reviews.text: Watch seems fine. I'm familiar with fossil and like their watches. My complaint is about the packaging watch it came in. It came in a brown envelope with thin bubble lining but the metal case was bent and open. The watch came out of the metal case and it just not secured at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lia Fernanda Voiles

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good watch but will write a review later when more usage has taken place.
customer_reviews.text: Recipient says the watch is a bit heavy, but seems to work fine. Only time will tell (literally), but so far so good. Wish i knew how all the fancy features work so will have to do some research since the watch didn't come with any instructions.
customer_reviews.author: fair-review

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a wedding gift. Had to get it sized, not a problem at all, and was in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bebee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch. I purchased this item for my 12 year old son who is as wild and rough as the come and it's held up great. Looks good and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bayer

customer_reviews.title: Good solid watch
customer_reviews.text: I have had this watch for almost 3 years as a daily wear. I just had to replace the battery which was no problem, however finding a replacement watchband has been challenging...no luck yet as our local Fossil store here in Charleston has closed. Overall, good watch.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my boyfriends birthday and he immediately fell in love with this watch. With him being in law enforcement he loves that the watch has the blue line. The face is not too big nor is it too small, it's the perfect size. The gold is more like a bronze color but still looks great on the watch. The watch does come with a tin box, which makes it nice when giving it as a gift. However, the watch did fall out of the tin during transit, but did not sustain and scratches. Overall it is a beautiful watch, and makes for a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband. Came in your typical watch tin. In excellent condition. You get what you ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a present to an employee. They loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Wiersgalla

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!
customer_reviews.text: this watch is great! got it for my boyfriend as a graduation gift and he was so happy with it! it is a watch that can be dressed up or down. the silicon band is a huge plus as well. Very happy with this purchase! I've only ever heard good things about Fossil watches. It has been 4 months since I bought the watch and there have been no issues or scratches so far
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing watch. Beautiful and efficient. It is a head turner. I was scared the case was too big but it isnt. Buy this watch!
customer_reviews.author: MightyDuck

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cousin who is graduating high school. Was a little worried about what it was going to look like and the quality but I was happy when it came, it's good quality and a heavy duty watch.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: New purchase
customer_reviews.text: Big and ugly on my thin wrist, so naturally I love it. New purchase which seems solid from good materials.
customer_reviews.author: Bobo

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch.
customer_reviews.text: Watch received day it was scheduled to arrive, just a little late but it was fine. The watch seems to be ok despite the fact it was out of the tin. Watch feels solid, pretty good quality. I hope when it is received as a gift this Christmas, it is a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken clasp
customer_reviews.text: The watch was very nice except the clasp would not open. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: staylor3

customer_reviews.title: It’s badass
customer_reviews.text: Great piece my father loved it has a good sleek design, the band is very resistant and comfortable, and the color and black and blue looks good with any piece of clothing you choose to wear
customer_reviews.author: Majin_blu42

customer_reviews.title: Junk watch
customer_reviews.text: Watch is junk, spent a lot of money to have a watch with a crack in the face. Which leads to water infiltration,Then the watch can't be read. Customer support was not helpful, and the company wouldn't warranty it. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice watch and the time portion works
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice watch and the time portion works, but the stopwatch does not. I don't do a lot of sprints, so I don't really need a stopwatch, but it's sucks when you have a brand new watch and only half of the features work.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hanna

product_meta.title: Fossil Men's Machine Stainless Steel Chronograph Quartz Watch
product_meta.description:
Watch Sizing Guide Black on black and totally slick, this Fossil® chronograph watch makes any day a stylish day. Stainless steel case. Silicone strap with buckle closure. Three-hand chronograph movement with three sub-dials and a date display window. Knurled bezel design for a sporty feel. Water resistant to 50 meters/160 feet. Dimensions:Face Width 45mmFace Height 45mmFace Depth 13mmBand Width 24mmBand Circumference 9 1/2 inches

feature_bullets: Case size: 45mm; Band size: 24mm; quartz movement with 3-hand analog display, date window, and 3 chronograph subdials; mineral crystal face; imported
Black plated stainless steel case with knurled bezel; black textured dial with silver-tone hands, hour, and minute markers

Black silicone band with buckle closure; interchangeable with all Fossil 24mm bands. Avoid long exposure to salt water. After contact with salt water, rinse watch under tap water if rated 5ATM or higher and wipe dry with a soft cloth
Water resistant to 165 feet (50 M): suitable for short periods of recreational swimming and showering, but not diving or snorkeling ; Circumference: 200 +/- 5mm
